text: You there! The person with the unassuming face!
Tell me: "What is a man?"
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

options.label: A miserable little pile of secrets.

text: Oh hush now, don't take offence.
I'm sure you'd make a great extra; you could blend into the background quite easily.
In fact, I can hardly take note of you as it is!
Alright, from the top:
"What is a man?"
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: Ugh, amateurs!
Look, if you're not going to play along, go play somewhere else.
I don't have time for your childish tomfoolery!
Ahem - "What... IS a man?"
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: Nonono - that's all wrong!
Ugh! It was just on the tip of my tongue...
You dolt! You've broken my concentration.
Don't you know not to interfere with a method actor playing a part?
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: "But enough talk..."
"Have at you!"
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: Encore!
That was marvelous! It's so good to find another thespian among the trash that seems to litter this place.
Tell me - where did you study? That was some of the finest method acting I've seen in ages!
Ahh, nevermind all that! You must be curious:
Who is this magnificent creature you see before you?
dialogue.name: Dialogue 1

text: Allow me to introduce myself -
I am Thessle - yes, THE Thessle.
Heh, I can see that you've been struck silent by my fame.
I know it must be quite shocking to meet such a huge star in a dump like this, but please, don't start fawning now.
Well, okay, you can fawn a little.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: Never heard of me?
Never heard of THESSLE!?
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: "Master of the mango!"
Wait - of all the crass, brazen, underhanded...
You're mocking me!
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: What? That's ridiculous?
Everyone knows smaller pens are inherently stronger than their larger counterparts!
Unless... wait... You're mocking me!
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: You uncultured swine!
Honestly, I shouldn't be surprised -
Who could expect any better of a face like that?
Leave me be! You need to make room for when my adoring fans show up.
They'll be here any minute now...
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: Yes, yes, let it sink in.
You are now standing before the one and only THESSLE!!
"Star of the stage!"
"Tamer of the theater!!"
"Paramount of the play!!!"
"Master of the..."
"Master of the..."
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: "Master of the monologue!"
Yes, that has a nice ring to it!
Keep that up and I might consider letting you in on a couple tricks of the trade.
We actors need to stay in peak mental and physical condition, but more importantly, we must be verbally prepared for any situation.
In the words of my dear old calligraphy instructor, "The pen is mightier than the..."
"The pen is mightier than..."
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: Yes! Exactly what I was going to say!
I must say, you're quite a natural talent.
I daresay there isn't much I could teach you with an insightful mind like that!
Well, as enjoyable as this encore has been, I must bid you adieu.
I need to be prepared for when my adoring fans show up.
They'll be here any minute now.
Farewell!
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: Aaaany minute now...
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: "WHAT - is - A - man?!"
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0
